main.name: Carolyn Mary Stolze
main.occupation: Full stack developer and creative director
main.description: Ready to leverage this unique combination of technical and design skills mixed with a passion for establishing meaningful relationships, by passing along knowledge to those simultaneously learning from (collaboration at its finest), to create cutting edge designs, user experiences and technologies that are beneficial to the diverse, global audience.
main.bio: Full stack developer with an extensive background in creative arts, branding and advertising. Excited to leverage this unique combination of technical and design skills mixed with a passion for establishing meaningful relationships, by passing along knowledge to those simultaneously learning from (collaboration at its finest), to create cutting edge designs, user experiences and technologies that are beneficial to the diverse, global audience.
main.contactmessage: What's my next collaboration? Drop me a line and let's figure it out!
